rev.desc.rev.desc: if (not null(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work))
if (not null(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work) and not null(30 in $L.i in data in $L.work))
Dependant line item orders are not generated all at the same time if using SRC

if (not null($L.work) and not null(contents($L.work))) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(data in $L.work) do (if (not null(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work)) then (28 in $L.i in data in $L.work=str(30 in $L.i in data in $L.work)+":"+28 in $L.i in data in $L.work))
Dependant line item orders are not generated all at the same time if using SRC

if (not null($L.work) and not null(contents($L.work))) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(data in $L.work) do (if (not null(28 in $L.i in data in $L.work)) then (28 in $L.i in data in $L.work=str(30 in $L.i in data in $L.work)+":"+28 in $L.i in data in $L.work))
